thread.title: 4 Alarm Clocks Smart Enough to Actually Get You Out of Bed - WSJ

author: Steven Melendez
title: 4 Alarm Clocks Smart Enough to Actually Get You Out of Bed - WSJ
text:
ALARM CLOCKS have been replaced on night stands by smartphones with unlimited alarms that adjust automatically for time zones and daylight savings. But as research mounts suggesting blue light from our devices throws off sleep rhythms, more people are getting their phones out of the bedroom and a new wave of smart alarm clocks is ready to help wake upâ€”and fall asleep.
1. Kello
